text: Hagi Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahe'mo'zane, Juda vahe'mo'zanema haza havi zamavu'zmava zamo higeno, Ra Anumzamofona arimpa ahegeno Agri avure'ma mani'naretira zamahe kasopetrege'za ru moparega umani'naze. Hagi Zedekaia'a Babiloni kini ne'mofo kea antahino amagera onte'neanki ha' arente'ne.
